document.full_text: indiana lawmakers ended a five-week standoff on monday as democrats wrung compromises in republican-sponsored bills they see as part of a national push to strip u.s. public sector unions of bargaining rights.
document.title: indiana democrats end stand-off on union rights
lines_and_colors: indiana lawmakers ended a five-week standoff on monday as democrats wrung compromises in republican-sponsored bills they see as part of a national push to strip u.s. public sector unions of bargaining rights.
